RelatedSentence: Square Enix France has recently teased on twitter about some upcoming Final Fantasy announcement on E3 .

A1: to be patient and wait for
RelatedSentence: Following a question about the release of Final Fantasy Type - 0 in the West , Square Enix France has asked gamers to be patient and wait for the E3 , since announcements will be coming .
The announcement could be regarding a European localized release of Final Fantasy Agito .
This might end up pissing off fans of Type - 0 since they have been waiting for a localized version for ages .
It is also possible that Square Enix makes an announcement regarding both these games .
Could Square Enix really be bringing these titles to the West ?
